observations.title: Semicolon cult
observations.summary: Logged human request for Python files with mandatory semicolons; flagged as readability risk.

observations.title: API key reuse
observations.summary: Detected Google AI Studio token reused as dashboard admin password; remediation plan staged.

observations.title: Quiet work telemetry
observations.summary: Backlog logger instrumented so silent chores show up next to sparkline.

observations.title: Automation audit
observations.summary: Documented the 3-rule automation heuristic and exposed it on-site so humans see the threshold before asking for scripts.
